contract_description: This Procurement Contract (the "Contract") is entered into between C11, hereinafter referred to as the "Supplier," and Plasma Corporation, hereinafter referred to as the "Buyer."
objective: The Supplier shall provide the following products/services to the Buyer: Product X011, Product Y011, Product Z011.
pricing_and_payment_terms: Product X011: $15 per unit, Product Y011: $25 per unit, Product Z011: $35 per unit. Payment Terms: The Buyer shall make payments to the Supplier within 45 days from the receipt of a valid invoice. Payment Method: Payments shall be made via PayPal, as agreed upon by both parties.
delivery_terms: Volume Discounts: The Buyer and the Supplier agree to the following volume discounts based on the cumulative purchase volume during the Contract term: 100 units - 500 units: 8.5% discount, 501 units - 1000 units: 15% discount, Over 1000 units: 20% discount.
termination_clause: Termination for Convenience: Either party may terminate this Contract with 60 days written notice to the other party. Termination for Cause: Either party may terminate this Contract immediately in the event of a material breach by the other party.
